actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the accumulated earnings credit from $150,000 to $300,000.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase from $150,000 to $300,000 the minimum amount of retained earnings which a corporation may accumulate without being subject to the tax on accumulated earnings.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the accumulated earnings credit from $150,000 to $300,000.
